trends: There has been one other sighting in Fairhope
There were no other sightings in Fairhope on or around September 19th 2013
Summary: I was watching the sky from my from my front porch. I saw a triangular shape aircraft moving very slow across my yard.
divs: Sighting DetailsAfter I recently first discovered Entity's a few months ago, I started going outside again at night when the dogs bark. I was just sitting on my front porch when I saw this slow moving triangular craft with many bright lights. It moved silently and slowly above my front yard.
